originalText.text: I find Dr.Rooprapunt C, to be one of the best neurologist and he provides excellent care when meeting with his patients. I feel great when I meet with him. I was recommended by my primary physician Dr.Chow D , and when I met with him I really was impressed with how he explained why I needed surgery and details of the surgery. The after he provided insured me that I would heal in due time from my neck surgery. This was a major surgery he performed on me and I heal the way Dr Chanland said.  I realize then why he’s considered to be the top neurologist in the state of New York. Because of  the way that he provides support to his patients and the overall care when meeting with patients is excellent. Yes I think he’s a great doctor/person I’ve ever met and I tell him this every time we meet, because of the quality of care he provides. I know I’m repeating about the care I receive, but what can I say other than he’s a great doctor to sit down with and discuss your situation and concerns with. Thank you Dr.D, Chow, don’t get me wrong about her she’s just as great, and her doctor recommendations are great. Thank you guys for the overall care received.

originalText.text: Doctor Chanland Roonprapunt has been the best doctor I have ever been to! He is a MIRACLE WORKER and helped me out so much when I was in pain. His staff workers are the best team that are nice and friendly and easy to speak. Before my surgery, he had been patient, helped me calm my pain, and ensured I was comfortable getting this surgery. After my surgery, he made sure to check up on me and made me conformable to ask him any questions I had. I feel like a new person, with no headaches and back pain. He is the best doctor I have visited, and I will always be thankful that I ended up in his hands. No words can describe the amount of appreciation I will always have for Doctor Roonprapunt . Thank you so much for making me feel young again like I never had a problem.

originalText.text:
Dr Chan and his team took me through a life changing spinal fusion surgery with total care and compassion. I had seen a few neurosurgeons over the years but from the moment I met him I knew I wanted to do this with him. Dr Chan is a top surgeon in a city full of great surgeons but it was his care and genuine concern that really helped me prepare for and go through a long difficult recovery.
The surgery was complicated and went almost 10 hours. When I see the before and after pictures I am shocked and feel grateful I was able to find such a great surgeon
Dr Chan came to see me several times at the hospital post-op rehab and made sure I had the best care possible. Today, 3 months after surgery my pain is minimal compared to before and I can walk over 5,000 steps!
Dr Roonprapunt is a great surgeon and an admirable caring man. I’m grateful to be in his care. I would highly recommend him to anyone looking for a great and caring spinal neurosurgeon.

originalText.text:
Dr. Chan is by far the best doctor i have ever dealt with in my entire life. He is a compassionate, caring neuro-surgeon, who is down to earth and easy to talk to. Never makes you feel rushed and he explains everything in easy to understand terms. I  was unable to walk with out excruciating pain. Forget picking up my grand kids! My quality of life was low! One week after surgery, i was almost pain free. I still have to rest and take it easy for the next couple of months, and let my body heal, but waking up every day and not having to deal with debilitating pain is absolutely amazing! I recomend Dr. Chan to everyone I know who is suffering from any kind of back pain.
Dr. Chan and his staff are nothing short of miracle workers!
Special shout out to Dr. Chans associate Nancy.

originalText.text: I have been with Doctor Chan for more than seven years in every encounter he has made  me feel as family. All of my back issues have been resolved.  He has done all in his power to help me. The man is a Brilliant surgeon. I thank him with my prayers daily
